forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: finding friends

comments.text: when you open the areas dialog fro the main menu, you can see some of the liveliest areas listed near the top with a people icon.
you can also see who's on by going to in.anyland.com in your browser.
when you find someone you want to stay in touch, context-laser them and hit "add as friend".
people you added as friends can ping you.
you can also always see your friends listed in your friends list, and their area too (if the area is public, and they're not set to be "unfindable" in their settings).

thread.latestCommentText: you can also always see your friends listed in your friends list, and their area too (if the area is public, and they're not set to be "unfindable" in their settings).
